item.description:
The weather looks good for tomorrow morning on the hourly for weather.com so i am posting this ride to Harvard from Concord for tomorrow morning.

Route Summary:
38 mile ride starting in Concord thru Maynard and Stow to Harvard MA
and back through Littleton and Acton with some big hills near Harvard.

The length of this ride puts this in the intermediate category.

The route
http://tinyurl.com/7uc2aje

Riders should plan to meet at 9:00 am and be ready to ride around 9:15 pm.

We should return to the parking area around 12:30 pm if we can keep the 12 plus pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point
8 Keyes Rd Parking Area
Concord MA

Midway point

Harvard General Store
1 Still River Road
Harvard, MA 01451
(978) 430-0062
harvardgeneralstore.com

What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
minimum 2-3 full water bottles (cold!).
bring snacks


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

http://files.meetup.com/482869/ConcordHarvardRide.txt
item.name: Concord To Harvard Loop Ride
